participant_1.background:
I remember playing the violin for my family at the holidays and seeing the look on their faces as they listened.
i feel that i can t live up to many people s standards.
I enjoy listening to Jason Mraz's music to help me cope with the loss of my parents.
I like to dye my hair fire engine red, because it's bold and makes me feel like I can take on anything.
I enjoy entertaining my former students and catching up on their lives.

participant_2.background:
I'm catching up on my reading this weekend.
I listen to music to escape from my world for a little while.
i hope one day to own a stable of at least 10 race horses.
I eat fruits like apples and bananas for their natural sweetness.
I'm not sure my parents would approve of my music hobby, but it's something that I love and it helps me to relax.

content.text: Hello there!
Hello, how are you today?
Pretty good, I was just playing the violin and thinking of my parents.
Oh, are you a musician?
Yes, I have been playing since I was a child.
That's wonderful! I wish I could play an instrument.
It's never too late to learn!
I know, I've been thinking about taking lessons.
That's great! I'm sure you'd be a natural.
Thanks! I hope so.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, listen to music, and eat fruit.
Those are all great hobbies! I also enjoy reading and listening to music.
What's your favorite book?
That's a tough question, but I'd have to say "To Kill a Mockingbird".
That's a great book! I love Harper Lee's writing style.
Me too, she's a wonderful writer.
I'm glad we have similar tastes in books.
Me too! I'm always looking for new books to read.
Me too! I love finding a good book that I can't put down.
Same here! I'm always on the lookout for new books
